function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of good sunlight and air flow in building design","Impact":"Reduced ability to treat contagious diseases such as tuberculosis or Covid-19","Mitigation":"Design buildings with large and wide openings, and prioritize good sunlight and air flow","Technologies":"Natural ventilation systems, UV sterilization technology","People":"Building occupants, particularly those with contagious diseases","Owner":"Architects, building designers, and public health officials"},{"Description":"Inadequate cleanliness and surface contamination","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission through contact with contaminated surfaces","Mitigation":"Implement strict cleaning protocols, minimize the use of materials that retain germs, and adopt antimicrobial surfaces","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coatings, UV-C disinfection systems, automated cleaning robots","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and those in close proximity to contaminated surfaces","Owner":"Facility managers, cleaning staff, and building maintenance personnel"},{"Description":"Inefficient home designs for Covid-19 treatment and prevention","Impact":"Reduced recovery rate and increased spread of the disease within homes","Mitigation":"Adapt home designs to facilitate treatment and reduce disease spread, prioritize healthy environments for patients","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HEPA filters, UV air sterilization, smart home technology for monitoring and controlling air quality","People":"Home occupants, particularly those with Covid-19","Owner":"Homeowners, architects, interior designers"}]}
